deployment.title: Deployment & Backfill
deployment.description: All installation, backfill, and on-site services are delivered across Europe by vetted freelancers and our core team.

supply.title: Suppliers & Manufacturing
supply.description: Our supplier and factory network spans the globe, optimized for cost efficiency without unnecessary quality checks. Real-time optimization via Neo4j dashboards.

vision.title: Forward-Looking Vision
goals: Launch articles section showcasing market insights and use-cases
